reviews.review_text: I would like to address an issue I encountered at McDonald's today. Without asking the customer, I was given a medium-sized meal instead of the regular one I had ordered. While it‚Äôs not about the money, it‚Äôs about the waste of food and beverages. For example, a 6-year-old child cannot consume that much food or drink. I believe this should be avoided, as it leads to unnecessary waste. I would appreciate it if the team could ensure that the right portion sizes are given based on customer needs, rather than targeting specific upsells that may not suit everyone. Thank you.

Fraud behaviour of team in this McDonald‚Äôs!!!
Be aware, demand a bill and check it carefully.

The girl with the name Nikita G. Included In my bill 4 portions of wings. I didn't order them. When she repeated my order several times she skipped that item, and then, when they gave my order no wings were there. And she didn't gave me a bill at the moment of my payment. When I asked to print it 3 guys from the team were trying to avoid giving it to me.
They told- take a picture of the screen. I insisted on getting a bill, checked it, and understood why they behave so strange.

After requesting the service person to give a fried leg üçó piece instead of a plane piece of chicken... The didn't do as requested... + I told them not to add ice to my cold drink but yet did it so...
Useless this word useless is for a reason I'm using it in my comment... & Uncooked for the first time...üò°
